s.text: You and I have never been on particularly good terms, and I regret not burying that hatchet while you were still alive, but at the same time, I can't help but think that your passing adds a sense of closure to twelve years of horror.

The other two people, GRANT and SATTLER turn to look at him.
He was just so intent on making history that he forgot the human cost could be devastating.

We can't see his face, but he makes his way over to two other individuals standing apart from the main group who we only see from the back.
